str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Endurance, steadfastness, patient waiting for. From hupomeno; cheerful endurance, constancy.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I acquire, win, get, purchase, buy, (b) I possess, win mastery over. A primary verb; to get, i.e. Acquire.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
